name: Real Dark Mode [Youtube]
description:
This is still a WIP but feel free to leave me Feedback in the Disscusions.

It will ONLY theme elemets that Youtube's Dark mode does by Default!



Changelog:
February 26, 2019: Initial Release
March 1, 2019: some small fixes
March 13, 2019: Big Update a lot of fixes and a new Search Box
August 24, 2019: some small fixes
September 13, 2019: fixed a new color variable
